text: Nebukatnesar Babilonɨn atrivimɨn itima, an namba 19ɨn azenim otogha ghua an namba 5ɨn iakɨnimɨn, an namba 7ɨn aruem oto. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn, Nebusaradan, an atrivimɨn garir mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanir faragha zuim, a dɨkavigha Babilonɨn atrivimɨn ingangarim gativagh an ganasa Jerusalemɨn ize.
